今日はシリウスシュガーによる訓練を終えた\nプレ・クラス－Ａの４名を連れて、再び:
I finished my training with Sirius Sugaru today.
She’d brought the four members of Pre-Class-A with her to Mayse again.
指導役はもちろん、引き続きシリウスシュガー。\n彼女達も指導を通して、顔つきが成:
The instructor, of course, continued to be Sirius Sugaru.
It seemed that their faces had grown through their guidance as well.
さて、久しぶりの実地訓練ですわ。\n散々だったあの日を見返せるよう、十分な訓練を:
Now then, it's time for our first field exercise in a while.
I've trained hard enough to be able to look back on that terrible day.
みなさん、存分にその成果を発揮してください！\nさあ、敵の群れのお出ましですわ！:
Everyone, please show us the fruits of your labor!
Now, a swarm of enemies has arrived!
先頭はあたしが抑える！ ラウラは後方から援護、\n心香とノエルはサイドから崩しに:
I’ll hold back the lead! Laura supported from the rear,
Koko and Noel are about to collapse from the side!
わかった。ノエル、左前方の高台なら、死角から効率的に狙えそうよ。: Understood. Noel, with the heights ahead to the left, we should be able to aim efficiently from a blind spot.
やったぁ！ じゃあそこもらうね！ よ～っし、やるぞ～！: Yay! I'll take that! Alright, let's do this!
ジュリーちゃん、危なくなったらお姉ちゃんが守るから！\n安心して戦ってね……！:
Julie, if things get dangerous, I'll protect you!
Don't worry and fight...!
ジュリーの指示どおりバランスよく配置された面々が、\nそれぞれの役割をこなしてい:
Just as Julie had instructed, the well-balanced members of the group were deployed
We each took on different roles.
ノエルは要所に火力を集中し敵の意識を分散させ、\nジュリーへのヘイトを散らしてい:
Noel focused her firepower at key points, dispersing the enemy’s consciousness
I'm scattering hate on Julie.
ラウラは的確な援護で他の機への被害を防ぎ、\n心香が戦況分析と情報伝達を冷静に行:
Laura blocked the damage to the other planes with precise support
Shinko calmly analyzed the state of the battle and relayed information, creating a commanding movement.
見違えたな……あいつらも相当本気で訓練したみたいだ。: That's unrecognizable... Looks like they've been training for real.
会長の言っていた陰謀……ボンクラを送り込み、\n指導を失敗させる目論見だったか。:
The conspiracy the president was talking about... Sending in blockheads...
Was she planning to make her guidance fail?
そんなものが成就するとは思えない。\n少なくとも、この光景の前では。:
I don't think something like that will come to fruition.
At least, not in front of this scene.
俺がそう呟いたとき──\nＭＧのセンサーが、新たな反応を検出した。:
Just as I murmured that...
MG's sensors detected a new reaction.
敵増援を確認。あの子達の戦力だけでは対処困難。: Enemy reinforcements confirmed. It's difficult to deal with them alone.
では、わたくし達の出番ですわね。準備はよろしくて？: Well then, it's our turn. Are you ready?
七彩の号令と共に飛び出すシリウスシュガー隊。\nその戦いも、以前より洗練されてい:
The Sirius Sugar Squad leapt out with Shichisai’s command.
Even that battle was more refined than before.
めるも言っていたが、人に教えることで、自らを見直す──\n自らの学びを言語化し、:
As Meguru said, by teaching others, I can reevaluate myself.
They put their own learning into words and reconstructed it.
それを行うことで、彼女達もまた、\nプレ・クラス－Ａから教わることがあったのだろ:
By doing that, they, too,
Pre-Class-A must have taught her something.
いい調子だ……これならまたきっと、\n一緒に<r=プライマル・ベルト>原生帯</:
She's doing well... I'm sure she'll be able to do it again...
Together, we should be able to take the new route of the <r-primal belt> Primogenitor belt!
俺の機体のとあるレーダーのひとつに、不審な金属反応が一瞬だけ写る。: One of my aircraft's radars shows a suspicious metallic reaction for a moment.
このレーダーはＭＧ競技や人工構造物の探知が主で、\nメイズ内で使われることは滅多:
This radar was mainly for MG competitions and detection of artificial structures
It’s rarely used inside a maise.
だが……確かに反応があった。\n金属の飛行体が、メイズ内に？ 誤検知だろうか……:
But... there was definitely a reaction.
There's a metal flying object inside the mace? Maybe it's misdetected...
なんだ……！？ 陣形保て！ 不慮の事態に備えるんだ！: What...?! Maintain formation! Prepare for unexpected situations!
止まんないっ……まずいよ！ 防衛ラインが突破された！\nあの子達の方に行く！:
I can't stop... This is bad! The defensive line has been breached!
I'm going to the girls!
突破したメイズシフターがプレ・クラス－Ａ組へ猛進する。\nだが──彼女達には目も:
Having broken through, the Maizsifter made a mad dash for Pre-Class-A.
But she didn't even bat an eye at them. She just kept running.
まるで、何かから逃げてるようじゃないか。: It’s like she’s running away from something.
振動センサーに感あり！\nでもこんなの、<r=ケイブ・ベルト>地穴帯</r>で観:
I can feel the vibration sensor!
But this isn't on the level of being observed in the <r-cave belt> Earthhole belt...
ドリフトからゆっくりと姿を現したのは、\n見たこともないような──巨影だった。:
Slowly emerging from the drift was...
I've never seen such a huge shadow before.
俺の言葉の直後に、メイズシフターがその巨体を震わせ、\nメイズ全域に響くような咆:
Immediately after my words, the Mayse-Sifter’s massive body trembled
It let out a roar that echoed throughout the entire Mayse region.
弾かれるように、その場にいた全員が\n退却を始める。それでいい、今はあいつに敵わ:
As if repelled, everyone present
We'll start retreating. That's fine. I'm no match for him right now!
ちょ……ラウラぁ！！\n何してんの、逃げなさいってばぁ！！:
Hey... Laura!!
What are you doing? Run away!!
しまった！ ラウラは人一倍、恐怖心が強い。\n克服する努力はしたとはいえ、完全で:
Crap! Laura was more terrified than most.
I may have tried my best to overcome it, but it wasn't perfect.
こんな事態に見舞われた不運。\nそれがラウラが逃げるのを一歩遅らせた。:
This was the kind of misfortune that had befallen her.
That delayed Laura’s escape by a step.
メイズシフターの一撃が振るわれる。\nラウラの機体は、いともたやすく吹き飛ばされ:
The Mayse-Sifter swung its attack.
Laura's machine was blown away with ease.
跳躍ユニットが破壊されている！\nあれでは逃げるのは困難だ。:
The jumping unit has been destroyed!
It would be difficult to escape with that.
だが……見捨てるわけにいくか！\n仲間が死ぬなんて、まっぴらゴメンだ！:
But... I can't just abandon her!
I don't want my friends to die!
全機反転！ 戦闘態勢を取れ！\nラウラの撤退を援護する！！:
All units, turn around! Get ready for battle!
I'll cover Laura's retreat!!
腹をくくった俺達に、\nメイズシフターはまた大きな咆哮を返した。:
As we braced ourselves,
The maise shifter let out another loud roar in response.
